description.lang: This device is a multiple functions button switch. It is able toswitch the appliances on/off or adjust the percentage of dimmer.The well designed wall bracket andmagnetic back let the switch can be fixed on the wall. This productcan be included and operated in any Z-Wavenetworkwith other Z-Wavecertified devices from other manufacturers and/or other applications.
Control the value represented by the left-side in area D. E.g. Setting this configuration to 0x0F means range of Command Basic Set value start from 0x0F.
basic set value of OFF from 0~99
The interval time for auto re-porting the Battery level. 0 means turn off auto report battery. The default value is 12.
